thread.title: BRIEF-FIH Mobile Sees Group's FY Net Loss At Around $525 Mln Or Below

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FIH Mobile Sees Group's FY Net Loss At Around $525 Mln Or Below
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - FIH Mobile Ltd:
* ‍EXPECTS GROUP‘S TURNOVER FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017 TO EXCEED US$12 BILLION​
* EXPECTS TO RECORD CONSOLIDATED NET LOSS FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DEC 2017. LOSS IS CURRENTLY EXPECTED TO BE AROUND US$525 MILLION OR BELOW
* EXPECTED LOSS DUE TO NET LOSS FROM IMPAIRMENT OF GROUP‘S INVESTMENT PORTFOLIO, CURRENTLY EXPECTED TO BE AROUND US$215 MILLION OR BELOW Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
